title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Focus Group Discussions for Pharmaceutical Management Education Model Development

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental pharmaceutical management knowledge and three or more years of practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners analyze five core competencies (professional identity, practical skills, instructional design, assessment methods, implementation barriers) of medication management education models through focus group discussions
Learners can design educational content, methods, and assessment tools for a medication management curriculum based on real-world cases.
Learners can develop institution-specific educational operation strategies considering the discussed constraints.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
